option.value:
package com.example.kindspark.ui.theme
import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
val Purple80 = Color(0xFFD0BCFF) val PurpleGrey80 = Color(0xFFCCC2DC) val Pink80 = Color(0xFFEFB8C8)
val Purple40 = Color(0xFF6650a4) val PurpleGrey40 = Color(0xFF625b71) val Pink40 = Color(0xFF7D5260)
// Kind Spark Colors val KindnessGreen = Color(0xFF4CAF50) val KindnessGreenLight = Color(0xFF81C784) val KindnessGreenDark = Color(0xFF2E7D32)
val WarmOrange = Color(0xFFFF9800) val WarmOrangeLight = Color(0xFFFFB74D) val WarmOrangeDark = Color(0xFFF57C00)
val SoftBlue = Color(0xFF2196F3) val SoftBlueLight = Color(0xFF64B5F6) val SoftBlueDark = Color(0xFF1976D2)
val NeutralGray = Color(0xFF757575) val LightGray = Color(0xFFF5F5F5) val DarkGray = Color(0xFF424242)
